page.title: 15FECKENHAM NEWCOMERS 3
page.content: WHY WE MOVED TO FECKENHAM-A NEWCOMER We decided that we wanted a more rural life than we had in London. So my husband looked for another job. He found a job in Birmingham so we had to look for a house within commuting distance of Birmingham. We chose Feckenham as it was a small unspoilt village with much charm and character. It was not too cut off having its own post office and a bus service to Redditch. The bus is important as I can't drive. It also had its own village school and nursery this was essential as we have four children. The house is a renovated barn in a lovely position off the main road with a lovely veiw overlooking fields. It is an ideal place for children, they can play safely away from the traffic.
